title: Reflection On My 1A Term At Waterloo
description: “Hi, my name is Aaron. What is yours?”. This question filled the campus during the first two weeks of orientation. It was an opportunity to meet the people I would be studying with for the next 5 years without the burden of schoolwork. From Nerf wars in the math building to parties in the parking lot, it was an exciting time to be a freshman...

title: My Trip To China
description: "This is your captain speaking. We will be arriving in Shanghai in 15 minutes". It had been 8 years since I last saw my grandparents. Due to the coronavirus, our trip had been postponed from the March Break of 2020 to the Summer of 2023. Perfect. Just in time for the hot China summer…

title: How I Got Into Waterloo Computer Science
description: "Congratulations, you have been accepted into Computer Science at the University of Waterloo!" I stared at the screen in disbelief as the message rang in my head. Four years of hard work, stress, and discipline had paid off. I had entered my dream school...
